Healthy.treatment: Maintain regular watering and monitor for any changes.
Healthy.watering: Water when top soil feels dry.

Powdery.treatment: Improve air circulation, avoid overhead watering, and remove infected leaves.
Powdery.organic_option: Baking soda spray or Neem oil.
Powdery.watering: Water at soil level, not on leaves.

Rust.treatment: Remove and destroy infected plant parts, ensure adequate spacing, and avoid wet foliage.
Rust.watering: Water early morning at root level.
